e4: The concerns from the person in charge, specifically about financial difficulties that may arise after altering policy. The concern also goes in the line he has to tell public that will probably find it too complex and retail investor losing trust because of new changes and this is already present right now,
e5: The truthfulness of how that financial information is shown without causing damage or not causing an illusion in other ways.
e6: What specific plans would be put in place to educate stakeholders about any changes to earnings reporting policies, and How investor relations team will handle situations where some investors continue to apply old accounting practices?
